titles.title: RS746 God, your glory we have seen in your Son

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the fields of this world his good news he has sown,
And sends us out to reap till the harvest is done:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In his love like a fire that consumes he passed by;
The flame has touched our lips; let us shout: 'Here I am!':

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He was broken for us, God-forsaken his cry,
And still the bread he breaks; to ourselves we must die:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He has trampled the grapes of new life on his cross;
Now drink the cup and live; he has filled it for us:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He has founded a kingdom that none shall destroy;
The corner-stone is laid; go to work, build with joy!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
God, your glory we have seen in your Son,
Full of truth, full of heavenly grace;
In Christ make us live, his love shine on our face,
And the nations will see in us the triumph you have won.
